author: Margaret Talev
title: Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Index: The virus hits home
description: Data: Ipsos/Axios poll; Chart: Danielle Alberti/Axios The share of Americans knowing someone who's tested positive has more than tripled in just a few weeks, to 14%, according to the latest installment of our Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Index. It's still highest …
content:
The share of Americans knowing someone who's tested positive has more than tripled in just a few weeks, to 14%, according to the latest installment of our Axios-Ipsos Coronavirus Index.
<ul><li>It's still highest in the Northeast, but last week alone it doub… [+3702 chars]
